title: The Heir of Hell
description: After several years of living a picture perfect life, Miranda's worst fears come true when Desmorelda makes a surprise return to Sidhe. Desmorelda's newest demand could threaten Miranda's ever-growing family and the entire realm of Sidhe. As Miranda works against a ticking clock to defeat her greatest enemy, she soon realizes Desmorelda is far from the only threat. Among Desmorelda's scheme, Miranda fights to keep her entire family from falling apart. Even after making the greatest sacrifice to save her family and the realm, her nightmare isn't over yet.Go on an adventure to thrilling new worlds with The Portal to Book 3. This book is the third book in a supernatural series full of horror and wild romance. Reunite with beloved characters, and meet enchanting new characters in the third book of The Sidhe Series, a novel full of lusty romance, evil, and the supernatural.
author: Kelsey Schaeffer
